fields.name: Effect:
fields.value:
Apply infinite phases of Rejuvenating to yourself immediately. Cures/Prevents Poisoned this phase.  

*Status takes effect **this** phase. This status is publicly announced. Read <#1191650444594909354> for more information on player statuses. Can ONLY be obtained through winning a Duel. Cannot be used in the phase it is obtained. Cannot be stolen/discarded.*
